text: Babu laifi a kansu game da ubanninsu, kuma babu game da ɗiyansu, kuma babu game da 'yan'uwansu maza, kuma babu game da ɗiyan 'yan'uwansu maza, kuma babu game da ɗiyan 'yan'uwansu mata, kuma babu game da matan muminai, kuma babu game da abin da hannayensu suka mallaka, kuma ku bi Allah da taƙawa. Lalle Allah Ya kasance Mahalarci a kan kome
